instruction: What pattern recognition algorithms were used in the proposed fast and effective classification method for Bachu mushroom using FT-IR spectroscopy?

instruction: Can the combination of FT-IR spectroscopy and statistical algorithms be considered a superior method for the classification of Bachu mushroom samples compared to traditional methods?
